document_data.name: Gestaniius
document_data.race: [[Fiend]]ish [[blue dragon]]In [[The Spectral Blaze]] she is described as a [[green dragon]], however this is a mistake, as all other sources state she is a blue dragon.
document_data.mainbody: '''Gestaniius''' was a [[blue dragon]] and one of [[Tiamat]]'s [[chosen]].
document_data.History:
She was invested with a third of Tiamat's divine power during the [[Time of Troubles]] but was devoured, along with [[Skuthosiin]] by the bearer of another third, [[Tchazzar]].

During the last [[Dracorage]], she was resurrected by Tiamat and sent to the [[Sword Mountains (Mulhorand)|Sword Mountains]] to create an army for Tchazzar, who was now her ally.

In [[1479 DR]], Gestaniius was attacking [[High Imaskar]] and at the same time was involved in the dragon game of [[Xorvintaal]], allied with the [[mercury dragon]] [[Praxasalandos]]. Her attack was repelled by the combined forces of the [[Platinum Cadre]] and the [[wizard]]s of High Imaskar, and she was killed by the combined efforts of the [[paladin]] [[Medrash]],
